sub_title: Climate & Energy research | Innovation | Global development
summary:
Working for the base of the pyramid through assessments, innovations and implementation of effective energy solutions. Research on energy, health, environment and business cases in developing countries.

-Founder of social enterprise Magic Ventures: Realising innovations that change lives
-Board member of the Dutch chapter of the international think-tank Club of Rome

Contact details
Mail: leon.simons@magicmitad.org
Phone: +31 6 - 47 15 73 13

projects: [{'title': 'Light up our Lives', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'description': "'Light up our Lives' is a pilot project to enable community members living in a naturally degraded environment in rural Ethiopia to generate off-grid renewable energy for their economic and social development. \nObjectives include: the reduction of carbon emissions from wood stoves, the reduction by 85% of the use of firewood, the rehabilitation of the natural environment, the improvement of food security and diversification of economic activities.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Leon', 'last_name': 'Simons', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Climate & Energy research | Innovation | Global development'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Chris', 'last_name': 'Soebroto', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Founder and Co-owner at De Blauwe Knikker (formerly Klimaatschimmel)'}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Liesbeth Pruijs', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Tjipke Bergsma', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Amsalu Negussie', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Jan Jaap Kleinrensink', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Leo Roozendaal', 'headline': None}]}]
